summary: Just a simple fix for Draugr light blue eyes
descriptionHtml:
Ever been in the situation that your character suddenly gets glowing eyes, well no longer here is a simple fix to fix that thing. I allways hated thos glowing eyes :P

http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=_pr7ld1Gazc

Just follow these instructions :)

In third person, open the console and enter \"player.addspell 000f71d1\"

- Close the console and notice a slight darkening around your character

- Open the console again and enter \"player.removespell 000f71d1\"

- Close the console and your eyes should stop glowing.
author: HauxiR
